column5: Hey there folks. Anybody seen salmon right at the river mouths or harbours yet. I fish from my yak and was considering fishing the mouth of the Saugeen. It has to be time with the cool water temps and all. Any news would be very appreciated.
The salmon have arrived in lots of areas and guys are getting them off the piers and in some cases in the creeks & rivers already !!!! Go get em !!!
I have not seen any reports from Huron yet but for Lake Ontario !!!!
Wow did I just hear a resounding HELL NO!! from the locals at the Geen Pier?!?!
Not bad, August 20th, I would have thought this post would have been made weeks ago.

Not bad, August 20th, I would have thought this post would have been made weeks ago.    Me too the boys have been flanking the east piers since late july, guys in Yaks have had trouble hooking Chins while casting due to the Yak moving during the hookset and not penetrating, but they are doing better trolling
Might need to take a trip down with the toon.. Just hope I don,t get shot at when I,m being dragged across the  US/CAN boarder line.LOL
You can always fish the river for steel.
You can always fish the river for steel.  I got some plans for the river this year Ralph. Going to start with short runs to see how the toon handles.  .
